mean_en: an arrangement with a company in which you pay them regular amounts of money and they agree to pay the costs, for example, if you die or are ill/sick, or if you lose or damage something
sentence: An insurance can offer financial protection against loss as a result of an accident.
sentence_trans: 保险能够提供经济保护，赔偿因事故造成的损失。
word_etyma: insur保证 + ance名词后缀 → insurance保险
